articles.author: Thomas Ricker
articles.title: Apple pulls remaining Lightning-based devices from European stores - The Verge
articles.description: Apple has removed all Lightning-based devices sold in Europe in compliance with the EU’s common charging solution that comes into force today.
articles.content:
Apple pulls remaining Lightning-based devices from European stores
